message: Hello again. Thank you for saving me from captivity up in the Charwood heights!
I won't dare to think about what those monsters would have done to me, had you not freed me!
In return, I am willing to teach you the things I know. I used to be a weapons trainer for the Charwood heights, before all of this started.

replies.text: What weapon types can you teach me?

message: I can teach you how to better handle most types of weapons, so that you can get even more proficient in them.
I can teach you about swords, either one-handed or two-handed ones. I know a bit about daggers, axes and blunt weapons. I also know a fair deal about fighting with your base fists.

replies.text: Tell me more about fighting with your base fists.
Tell me more about two-handed swords.
Tell me more about one-handed swords.
Tell me more about blunt weapons.

message: I only have time to teach you about one type of weapon, so make sure you pick the one that suits you best.
Two handed swords are usually much heavier than their one-handed counterparts, which means that they are much harder to swing correctly.

replies.text: Sounds good. Teach me two-handed sword fighting.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: In return, they provide much deeper cuts that hurt your opponent more. I can teach you how to better handle swinging your two-handed swords.
[Falothen teaches you the two-handed sword skill]
Bare fists, now that's my kind of style! When not being hampered by either a weapon or shield, you can be a lot more flexible in your moves.

replies.text: Sounds good. Teach me how to be better at unarmed fighting.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: Fighting bare-handed can make you land more successful punches, and will also make you quicker when dodging blows.
[Falothen teaches you the unarmed fighting skill]
One handed swords, now that's an art form. They have a wide range of uses, from slashing to piercing types.

replies.text: Sounds good. Teach me how to fight with one-handed swords.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: I can teach you how to handle them better, so that you land your attacks more often.
[Falothen teaches you the one-handed sword skill]
Daggers, the choice of the fast fighter. Their light weight usually makes you much faster when attacking. Some of them also have nasty side effects. Nasty for your opponent, that is.

replies.text: Sounds good. Teach me how to fight with daggers.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: I can teach you how to handle them better, so that you land your attacks more often.
[Falothen teaches you the dagger skill]
Oh yes. The mighty axes. You can do a lot of damage with them, if you know how to handle them correctly.

replies.text: Sounds good. Teach me how to fight with axes.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: I can teach you how to get better at fighting with all types of axes, from the small hatchet up to the larger two-handed greataxes. That way, you can be very versatile in your choice of weapons.
[Falothen teaches you the axe skill]
Now, blunt weapons is my way of categorizing everything from the simple club, to maces up to quarterstaves. The technique for using them well is mostly the same.

replies.text: Sounds good. Teach me how to fight with blunt weapons.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: I can teach you how to better land your blows with all blunt weapons.
[Falothen teaches you the blunt weapons skill]
There. That wasn't so hard once you get the hang of it, now was it?
I can help you get better in the other types of weapons as well, of course, if you want. But for that, I will have to require some form of payment.
Hello again, my friend. I hope you've been using what I taught you.
We usually don't teach anyone outside our settlement. Last time I did, I was given five Oegyth crystals and 5000 gold in return for my services.

replies.text: I don't have that on me right now. I'll be back.
I think I should hold on to those crystals some more.

message: Seeing as you saved me, I think it's reasonable to only require two of those crystals from you. I still have expenses to pay, mind you, so I will require that gold.
Yes, those things sure are valuable.
It seems you do not have the gold required for it.
Which weapon type would you be interested in?

replies.text: Tell me more about fighting with your base fists.
Tell me more about two-handed swords.
Tell me more about one-handed swords.
Tell me more about blunt weapons.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: I've already taught you that skill.
Two handed swords are usually much heavier than their one-handed counterparts, which means that they are much harder to swing correctly.

replies.text: Sounds good. Teach me two-handed sword fighting. Here are two Oegyth crystals and 5000 gold as payment.
Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

message: In return, they provide much deeper cuts that hurt your opponent more. I can teach you how to better handle swinging your two-handed swords.
[Falothen teaches you the two-handed sword skill]
Bare fists, now that's my kind of style! When not being hampered by either a weapon or shield, you can be a lot more flexible in your moves.

Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

Let's go back to the other types of weapons.

[Falothen teaches you the blunt weapons skill]
Well done! You learn quickly.
